TEXT.S: Don Adams‎ nalecuh i Royal Oak, Michigan, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Don Adams‎ i 1970 a mihcaan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 8 ku uwac atu silsil 120, namapili' tu nu San Diego Rockets putiput. nalecuhan ciniza i 11 a bulad 27 a demiad, 1947 a mihcaan. Don Adams, u kawaw niza sa, u miunduay. mapatay tuway ciniza i 2013 a mihcaan, u uzip niza sa, enem a bataan izaw ku enem ku mihcaan.
